cancelTransfer(uint256).custom:security: Only the sender can cancel their own transfers
cancelTransfer(uint256).details: Only the original sender can cancel their transfer

params._transferId: Unique identifier of the transfer to cancel

claimTransfer(uint256,string).custom:security: Only the designated recipient can claim the transfer
claimTransfer(uint256,string).details: Validates recipient, claim code, and transfer status before executing

params._claimCode: Claim code if required (empty string if none)
params._transferId: Unique identifier of the transfer to claim

createTransfer(address,address,uint256,u.custom:security: Ensure proper token approvals before calling for ERC20 transfers
createTransfer(address,address,uint256,u.details: Supports both native ETH and ERC20 token transfers

params._amount: Amount of tokens to transfer (ignored for ETH, use msg.value)
params._claimCode: Optional claim code for additional security (empty string for none)
params._expiryDuration: Duration in seconds until transfer expires (0 for default)
params._recipient: Address that can claim the transfer
params._tokenAddress: Token contract address (use 0x0 for native ETH)

returns._0: transferId Unique identifier for the created transfer
transferIds Array of transfer IDs for the recipient
transferIds Array of transfer IDs created by the sender
status Current status of the transfer
expired True if the transfer has expired, false otherwise

DEFAULT_EXPIRY_DURATION().notice: Default expiry duration when none is specified (7 days)

cancelTransfer(uint256).notice: Cancels a transfer and returns funds to the sender

claimTransfer(uint256,string).notice: Claims a transfer by the designated recipient

createTransfer(address,address,uint256,u.notice: Creates a new transfer that can be claimed by the recipient

getRecipientTransfers(address).notice: Gets all transfer IDs that can be claimed by a specific recipient

getSenderTransfers(address).notice: Gets all transfer IDs created by a specific sender

getTransferStatus(uint256).notice: Gets the current status of a transfer

isTransferExpired(uint256).notice: Checks if a transfer has expired

nextTransferId().notice: Counter for generating unique transfer IDs

recipientTransfers(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from recipient address to array of transfer IDs they can claim

senderTransfers(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from sender address to array of transfer IDs they created

transfers(uint256).notice: Mapping from transfer ID to transfer details
